attributes.action: We want David Cameron PM to debate Alex Salmond FM in a live televised Scottish referendum debate.
attributes.additional_details: In 2014 the people of Scotland face what has been called "the most important political decision of their lives."  We believe that to make a full informed decision the people of Scotland should hear the case for the union and the case for an independent Scotland be debated by the two most senior and democratically elected representatives of each position.
